data.name: Code Workshop Halloween Party 2019
data.description: Join us for our annual Halloween party when the spirits come out to code. Costumes not required, but always appreciated. Celebrate with lightning talks, a Halloweenn hackathon with great prizes, and Open Source Trick-or-Treat goodies and awesome food.

relatedRecords.name: Riverbed APM User Conference Vol. 2
relatedRecords.location: Microsoft Technology Centers, 12012 Sunset Hills Road, Reston, VA
relatedRecords.description: Our second peer-driven technical user conference event for the SteelCentral AppInternals and Aternity community will be held on August 29-30 in Washington, DC. Save the date!
